13 #define MCU_TEST_BIT(x,y) (x & (1<<y))
14 #define MCU_SET_BIT(x,y) (x |= (1<<y))
15 #define MCU_SET_MASK(x,y) (x |= y)
16 #define MCU_CLR_BIT(x,y) (x &= ~(1<<y))
17 #define MCU_CLR_MASK(x,y) (x &= ~y)
